name: Spelled Together
description:
After an evil warrior captured your cat, you venture into their castle-like cavern to rescue her! Gather spells and upgrades and mix them together to overcome the challenges of the cavern.

How to play: 

  • A / Left Arrow - Move left
  • D / Right Arrow - Move right
  • Z - Cast the spell
  • X - Change the spell
  • C - Change the upgrade
